message.content:
1. A randomized, double-blind, cross-over study was performed.
2. The study aimed to compare postprandial platelet activation.
3. The comparison was made after premeal injections of placebo or insulin aspart.
4. Two doses of insulin aspart were used: 0.1 and 0.2 units/kg.
5. The study involved 18 patients.
6. All the patients had type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM).

messages.content:
Statement: A randomized, double-blind, cross-over study was performed to compare postprandial platelet activation after premeal injections of placebo or insulin aspart (0.1 and 0.2 units/kg) in 18 patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
